member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the MD5 hash value of the current instance.
member.returns: The MD5 128-bit hash value of the current instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the current instance to a value.
member.returns: The representation of the current instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the current instance to an value.
member.returns: The representation of the current instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the current instance to an value.
member.returns: The representation of the current instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the current instance to an value.
member.returns: The representation of the current instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the current instance to a value.
member.returns: The representation of the current instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalizes the first letter of the current instance
member.returns: A copy of this string with capital first letter or the current instance if it is null or empty

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the substring between and starting from index of the current instance.
member.param: The string from which the result string starts.
The string at which the result string ends.
The zero-based character position from which the search starts.
member.returns: The substring from to starting from index of the current instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces all cyrillic letters with their latin representations in the current instance.
member.returns: A string in which all cyrillic letters are replaced by their latin representations.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces all latin letters with their cyrillic representations in the current instance.
member.returns: A string in which all latin letters are replaced by their cyrillic representations.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string in which all cyrillic letters in the current instance are replaced by their latin representations and all non-alphanumeric characters (excluding ".") are removed.
member.returns: A copy of the current instance in which all cyrillic letters in the current instance are replaced by their latin representations and all non-alphanumeric characters (excluding ".") are removed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string in which all cyrillic letters in the current instance are replaced by their latin representations, all white spaces are replaced by hyphens and all non-alphanumeric characters (excluding "." and "-") are removed.
member.returns: A copy of the current instance in which all cyrillic letters in the current instance are replaced by their latin representations, all white spaces are replaced by hyphens and all non-alphanumeric characters (excluding "." and "-") are removed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the first number of characters of the current instance.
member.param: The number of characters to be taken from the start of the current instance.
member.returns: A string consisting from the first characters of the current instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the file extension of the current instance interpreted as a file name.
member.param: The current instance interpreted as a file name.
member.returns: The file extension of the current instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the current instance interpreted as a file extension to a content type value.
member.param: The current instance interpreted as a file extension.
member.returns: The content type representation of the current instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the current instance to a byte array value.
member.returns: The byte array representation of the current instance.
